comment._content: And there is just one "s" in Strasbourg :)

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
I think Goodyear was confused between the French spelling (Strasbourg) and the German one  (Strassburg, with an Eszett). Or maybe we were. I'll have to check back to the originals and see if it needs an update. In the meantime, a properly spelled tag will help. 
Thanks for keeping us on our toes, Les Champs Libres! 
Deb Wythe, Digital Lab

Hello again -- our confusion, not Goodyear's. He used the German spelling, but we'll go for the current, French one.
Deb Wythe
